subject: Brake pedal issue
description_text:
Hi 

I am having an issue with my brake pedal which I fear will result in the pedal failing. 

I am seeing a lot of gold shards which I think is coming from the washer shown in pic attached. 

I don’t feel this is normal and I have been regularly spraying with contact spray. 

Any help in this please? 



Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Sabre Sim racer, It looks like brass/copper debris from the thrust bearing. You can remove the bearing and clean it, then reinstall and test again. If the bearing is worn or damaged, please let us know—we will send you a replacement part.

Sorry forgot to attach pictures 
Sent from my iPhone
